column5: Welcome to Dallas! Enjoy my quaint, clean, quiet and comfy 1 bedroom apartment located off of George Bush and the Tollway. It's central to all the major highways, the big city and the suburban cities in between without all of the hustle and bustle of downtown Dallas! A quiet and safe community that's great for business travelers, solo explorers or couples that want to getaway for the weekend. The whole place is yours, can't wait to host you!
column8: Comfy, Clean, Central, North Dallas Apartment
